items.name: static let additive: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode
items.desc: The particles are rendered using source-additive compositing.

items.name: static let backToFront: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode
items.desc: Particles are rendered from back to front, sorted by z-position. This mode uses source-over compositing.

items.name: static let oldestFirst: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode
items.desc: Particles are rendered oldest first. This mode uses source-over compositing.

items.name: static let oldestLast: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode
items.desc: Particles are rendered oldest last. This mode uses source-over compositing.

items.name: static let unordered: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode
items.desc: Particles are rendered unordered. This mode uses source-over compositing.
